column4: is there a program to make a gif out of the current screen, or selections of it?
is there a program to make a gif out of the current screen, or selections of it?
you give it the linux path
guys, archive manager doesn't open rar's anymore, what?
I thought it came with it Rug
how do I download rar support?
no, if you have all the repos enabled, apt-get install rar
how do I open a passworded rar?
do I have to use the CLI for that?
it just gave an error, I expected a password box to popup :S
goto a term window and work from there.   rar x -pPASSWORD file.rar
